alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 3:47PM EDT until August 30 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Storm surge and heavy rainfall associated with Hurricane Idalia is causing some local rivers to rise into Flood Stage over the next couple of days. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 3.8 feet late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 12/26/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (4 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 4.4 Wed 3 pm 2.9 3.4 3.0 2.6 0.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EDT.
